title: Kylie Jenner’s baby daughter Stormi recreates her iconic mermaid look for Halloween
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kylie Jenner’s one-year-old daughter has cemented her reputation as her famous mother’s mini-me after recreating her purple Met Gala look from earlier this year.

Kylie, 22, took to Instagram to share an adorable photo of Stormi dressed in a mini version of Kylie’s custom Versace lilac ensemble for Halloween .

The toddler completed the mermaid-style look by sporting an identical purple wig, instantly transforming her into a mini version of her mum.

The make-up mogul captioned the set of photos with “My baby!! I cant handle this!!” along with multiple purple heart emojis.

The post was immediately flooded with adoring comments, with Sofia Ritchie writing “Omg I can’t deal” with a heart eyes emoji.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Getty Images)

In a video shared alongside the posts, little Stormi can be seen modelling the adorable costume with style, although she appears to look baffled and a little confused at what was happening to her.

However, she reassuringly lets out a little giggle near the end of the short clip that made fans’ hearts melt.

Kylie made an unforgettable entrance to the Met Gala in May 2019 as she stepped onto the pink carpet wearing a glitzy form-fitting mermaid gown with purple feathered train, finished off with long lavender hair.

The gown itself was made of interlaced crystal mesh, Swarovski crystals and ostrich feathers and had removable large feathered sleeves.

Her show-stopping look was a nod to this year's theme, "Camp: Notes on Fashion."

description: The toddler was hailed as a perfect mini-me of her mum for her costume that was an exact match of Kylie's custom Versace mermaid dress
